type1_missing.reasoning: Client-side email format validation not implemented - no regex validation for email format on login page

Empty state message 'No tasks yet. Add your first task above!' not displayed when task list is empty
Session cookie name is 'session' instead of specified 'todo-session'

Database transactions using db.transaction() not implemented for bulk operations - functions use direct statements without transaction wrapper
Responsive design breakpoints and mobile-specific features not implemented - no flex-col for mobile, no min-height for buttons, statistics bar doesn't stack vertically on mobile
POST /api/auth/logout endpoint not implemented - logout directory exists but contains no route file
Middleware configuration for route protection not implemented - no middleware.ts file exists to protect dashboard routes

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Statistics section uses single container div instead of separate cards/boxes for visual separation as specified
Email validation uses HTML5 type='email' instead of specified regex pattern /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/

type3_extraneous.reasoning: CSV export endpoint not mentioned in API endpoints specification (section 6)
Dark mode CSS variables and theme configuration not specified in requirements
